datasets.name: Customer Transactions
datasets.description: Daily customer purchase data from point-of-sale systems. Essential for revenue tracking and customer analytics.

datasets.name: Inventory Master
datasets.description: Product inventory levels across all warehouses. Critical for supply chain operations.

datasets.name: User Analytics Events
datasets.description: Clickstream and user behavior tracking. Powers product recommendations and UX improvements.

datasets.name: Financial Reporting
datasets.description: General ledger and financial statements. Regulatory compliance required with strict SLA.

datasets.name: Marketing Attribution
datasets.description: Campaign performance and conversion tracking. Links ad spend to revenue outcomes.

datasets.name: Real-Time Pricing Engine
datasets.description: Dynamic pricing algorithm data. Updates every minute based on demand and competition.

datasets.name: Fraud Detection Signals
datasets.description: Real-time transaction risk scoring. Prevents fraudulent orders and protects revenue.

datasets.name: Supply Chain IoT Sensors
datasets.description: Temperature, location, and condition monitoring from shipping containers and warehouses.

datasets.name: Customer 360 View
datasets.description: Unified customer profile aggregating data from all touchpoints. Powers personalization at scale.

datasets.name: Predictive Maintenance ML
datasets.description: Machine learning models predicting equipment failures. Prevents costly downtime.
